metadata.title: CVE-2020-36785 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:atomisp: Fix use after free in atomisp_alloc_css_stat_bufs() The "s3a_buf"is freed along with all the other items on the "asd->s3a_stats" list. Itleads to a double free and a use after free.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
